description:
A polymancer who keeps hundreds of millions of bugs inside his body. The types of bugs he carries in his body are diverse, including regenerating bugs that repair themselves and blood-sucking bugs as well as bugs that strengthen his own abilities such as sensing and augmentation. Like Macapine, he sees Yngwie„ÄÅthe first of the Sorcerer Shogun, as his rival. He is also characterised by his hot and bitter behaviour.
Source: Official page
name: Ba Thory
